summary: Discover and explore an all new worldspace based on the planet of the Aesir Gods, Asgard. A hard quest with an Epic Boss, and lots of fun battles!
descriptionHtml:
This mod is no longer being supported!! However... It IS being recreated! Please, keep an eye out for the much bigger, highly improved....

[center][img]http://s14.postimg.org/nd66qwggh/preview.jpg[/img][/center]























NOTE!!!: V1.1 IS MISSING THE LOD FILE! THAT MEANS NO QUEST MARKERS!!! AND IF YOU ARE HAVING TROUBLE GETTING FREYJA TO TALK TO YOU TYPE IN "SetStage xx00fec0" (xx=load order number). I DON'T HAVE TIME TO WORK ON THIS ATM, BUT I WILL MAKE A NEW LOD SOON. NOT EVERYONE IS HAVING THE FREYJA PROBLEM, SO YOU MIGHT NOT NEED THE COMMAND! IT MAY BE A BETTER IDEA TO USE THE V1.0 FOR NOW! THE ONLY DIFFERENCE IS YOU WILL NOT HAVE TELEPORTS TO/FROM ASGARD AFTER THE QUEST IS COMPLETE.

[center][i]The Ancient Gods. The Forgotten Gods.
They have sent a messanger to Skyrim. They need a champion. They need the Dragonborn.[/i][/Center]
[center][Youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ObjQaOv0hZM[/Youtube][/center]

[NOTE1]: Anyone capable of doing very good voice acting that would like to waste a little time and put their vocals on this mod, PM me!
[NOTE2]: Depending on your lighting/ENB settings, some of the dungeons may be pitch VERY dark like in my screenshots/video, however, with default settings they will be easy enough to see without a torch.
[NOTE3]: If the preview video isn't loading at the top of this page, I'm not sure. If you want to see the preview find it under the "videos" tab or at: http://youtu.be/ObjQaOv0hZM

[center][img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/2681/g0vo.jpg[/img][/center]

V1.0 - Public Release
V1.1 - Added teleport spells that teleport to Valhalla, and back to Skyrim. They are in your Valhalla residence!

[center][img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/1078/1kyb.jpg[/img][/center]

Long ago, when the Nords still lived on Atmora and were called Atmorans, three divine beings came from the void. A handful of the Atmorans swore fealty to the gods and began to worship them. The gods and their followers disappeared as quickly as they had come, in the dead of night. The gods and those who had followed them were quickly forgotten as the great warrior Ysgrammor took another group of his people to Skyrim.

Now, a strange man, Bjorn Ironside, has arrived at the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar. He's asking about the Dragonborn, so it may be a good idea to pay him a visit and see what he needs.

This quest will take you on a journey to a brand new worldspace. Put you up against vicious, strong foes and let you sit and speak with the Gods themselves. The reward? How does your own private residence in Valhalla sound? Not enough? How about a chest filled to the brim with every item seen in this mod (except Loki's armor/mask)?

There is now 2 spell tomes on the dresser as soon as you enter your Valhalla residence. These will allow you to teleport between Asgard and Skyrim without going through the Ancient Temple. Teleport to Valhalla places you inside Valhalla, Teleport to Skyrim places you right outside the Ancient Temple. This will make the player home much more convenient.

I've tested the quest on a level 31 tank style on apprentice difficulty. I used a total of 35 Ultimate Healing Potions, so if your higher leveled and/or on a higher difficulty, you should bring plenty more, the final boss fight is pretty epic.

Some of the armors in the mod are male/female only, and there will probably never be an opposite gender version of that armor.

This mod goes well with mine: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44216//?

[center][img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/2217/tguw.jpg[/img][/center]

Apachii Hair IS required. Almost EVERY NPC uses apachii hair.

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
ApachiiHair.esm http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?
ApachiiHairMale.esm http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?


[center][img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/1770/d22p.jpg[/img][/center]

Sometimes the Fire Giants will get into a big brawl and all but 2 of them will die.
Sometimes a Ghost in the Frozen Dungeon spawns halfway under a snow drift, but he is still fightable and killable.


[center][img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/4158/npfs.jpg[/img][/center]

The gods for inspiring this mod!
Bethesda for Skyrim & the Creation Kit.
Omesean for creating Odins Beard. He also helped me A LOT through creating this mod.
Enoomnai for inspiring how to tie this mod into lore.
Hothtrooper44 for Odins Armor. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35793/?)
Zerofrost for Gungnir (Odins Spear)
Arcane51388 for The Great Evil.
aloneinshadow for Freyjas robes (without his mod shed be bald!)
OminousVoice for Thors helmet and weapon. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25709//?)
Cyric79 for Odin and Friggs Crowns.
ASGUARDVIKING for the norse warrior/shieldmaidens weapons and Odins warrior/shieldmaidens shields.
Croc for the norse warrior/shieldmaiden/Thors armor.
exray catt for the Frost and Fire Giants.
anton0028 for the valkyrie headdresses
nikinoodles for the cloaks
Meiller for Lokis mask & armor
If I missed anyone, I truly am sorry! Just let me know and I'll add you in!



PERMISSIONS!!!!:
DO NOT UPLOAD MY WORK OR ANY OF THE OTHER MODDERS' WORK IN THIS MOD TO OTHER SITES WITHOUT PERMISSION! MY MODS AS WELL AS SOME OF THE OTHERS I HAVE USED ARE NEXUS EXCLUSIVES!!!

DO NOT USE MY WORK OR ANY OF THE OTHER MODDERS' WORK WITHOUT PERMISSION!!!!
author: Saint Grimm
